newsitem.title: INDIA: Delhi shares close unchanged, ITC gains.
newsitem.headline: Delhi shares close unchanged, ITC gains.

text.p: Delhi shares ended virtually unchanged on Thursday as speculators sold shares selectively, but cigarette maker ITC Ltd closed higher on buying by foreign investors, brokers said.
The Delhi sensitive index closed 0.28 point lower at 770.48.
Traders said there was no major purchases due to the absence of any encouraging factor, but ITC was an exception.
"ITC was the most active stock throughout the day," broker Anil Saigal said.
ITC, which reported higher profits for 1996/97 (April-March) earlier this week, closed 5.75 rupees higher at 425.40.
Hindustan Lever shed eight rupees at 1,056.
